# Mobile App Security & Anti-Fraud Inside CI/CD

In this section of the Appdome Knowledge Base, learn how to bring Mobile App Security & Anti-Fraud Inside CI/CD, improve the protections in your Android & iOS apps, maintain mobile DevOps velocity and accelerate mobile DevSecOps. Connect Appdome's DevSecOps automation platform to your existing mobile CI/CD pipeline like AppCenter, GitLab, Bitrise, Travis, Jenkins, TeamCity, CircleCI, Bamboo, and more. Using Appdome's DEV-APIs and prebuilt plugin integrations with CI/CD, run single tasks or full jobs for all key actions available on Appdome including build cybersecurity and anti-fraud features, generate Certified Secure™ certification, automated code signing, team management, DevSecOps compliance audit and tracking, and more. If you don't find what you're looking for in this section of the knowledge base, enter your inquiry in the search field or contact support@appdome.com.
